attributes.action: Explain how vandalism is worse than cruelty to children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently there were 3 nicely contrasting stories in the press.
a) A mother, her sisters and her mother video'd a pair of children being forced to fight, penalty suspended sentance.
b) A guy organises dog fights, penalty a few months in prison.
c) A guy gets upset and vandalises the railway, causing some expenditure of money, penalty several years locked up.

Conclusion you can do what you like to kisd as long as you don't cost some rich person some money!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
